short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select and summarize any content using Google Gemini AI

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Mr. Brief is a powerful Chrome extension designed to enhance your browsing experience by allowing you to effortlessly select and summarize any content using the advanced capabilities of Google Gemini AI. Whether you're sifting through lengthy articles, research papers, or web pages, Mr. Brief helps you save time by providing concise summaries that capture the essence of the text.

Why Install Mr. Brief?
Time-Saving: Quickly get the main points of any content without having to read through everything.
User-Friendly: With simple keyboard shortcuts, you can summarize selected text in just a few clicks.
Versatile: Works on any webpage, making it an essential tool for students, professionals, and anyone who consumes a lot of information online.
Customizable: Tailor your summarization experience with easy-to-use options in the settings.
Install Mr. Brief today and transform the way you interact with online content!
